Name: Web Buttons Designer
About the game: Web Buttons Designer allow you in a very simple manner to design HTML buttons or App buttons (including games app) You have at your disposition over 270 blank buttons, ready to be customized in size and colors and over 980 icons in 4 resolutions each that you may include on your creations. This Web Buttons Creator allows also to customize your fonts with many effects like stroke, shadow, glow, or gradient colors. Buttons can be saved in 3 states : normal, active or hover and in 2 formats png and jpeg. You can also save templates of your creation. With Web Buttons Designer you'll be able to greatly enhance the visual aspect of your webpages or application without needing any graphical imaging tool specific knowledge.
